scripts.preinstall: gem install --user-install --bindir ~/bin --no-document --pre --verbose jekyll && npm install -g bower && bower update
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-favicon && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs src/js/**/*.js --beautify -o dist/js/yoshino-ui-core.js && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.build-styles: lessc src/less/index.less dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css --source-map-map-inline && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css -o dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-docs
scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/audio dist/css dist/img dist/js
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run deploy-scripts && npm run deploy-styles && npm run compress-styles && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-favicon && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.deploy-styles: lessc src/less/index.less dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css -o dist/css/yoshino-ui-core.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-jekyll & npm run watch-scripts
